Resarch Interests


My research interest is in improving interpretability and robustness in machine learning for communities affected by AI. I am interested in designing scalable and solutions for Human AI Interaction through technical tools and developing new frameworks. I keep a research proposal document of current research ideas.

Publications



  1. H2O: Open casebook, Digital Reading Experiences of Law Students Seonghee Lee, Jack Cushman, Catherine Brobston, Harmony Eidelton, 2023 18th ACM/IEEE International Conference on Human-Computer Interaction (CHI), 2023

    https://doi.org/10.1145/3544549.3573857 | video | code

  2. Coming In! : Communicating Lane Change Intent in Autonomous Vehicles Seonghee Lee, Paul Schmitt, Avarm Block, Aryman Pandya, 2023 18th ACM/IEEE International Conference on Human-Robot Interaction (HRI), 2023

    https://doi.org/10.1145/3568294.3580113 | video | news
  3. Safe to Approach : First Responder Interaction Protocols with Autonomous Vehicles Seonghee Lee, Paul Schmitt, Avarm Block, Aryman Pandya, 2023 18th ACM/IEEE International Conference on Human-Robot Interaction (HRI), 2023
    https://doi.org/10.1145/3568294.3580114 | video | news


  4. Exploring the Effects of Personal Impact Communicated Through Eco-Feedback Technology for Reducing Food Waste Seonghee Lee *, Daniela Rodriguez-Chavez *, Jeff Rzezotarski, International Human Computer Interaction Conference (HCII), 2023

    Ann S Robert Morley Undergraduate Research Grant
    * Both authors contributed equally
    pdf | code

  5. IEUM: Bridging Transportation to Humans Seonghee Lee*, Jin Ryu* and Jessie Y Kim, 17th ACM/IEEE International Conference on Human-Robot Interaction (HRI), 2022

    Best Student Paper Award HRI 2022
    * Both authors contributed equally https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.5555/3523760.3523986 | technical paper
